content: most discussion will be probably in codevscovid19.slack.com but if anything fhir hl7 related happens, please share it here also under this topic for the fhir community. hl7 participants active I'm aware are of are @Roeland Luykx @Beat Heggli @Fran√ßois von Kaenel @Michaela Ziegler, say hello here if i missed you, happy hacking at https://www.codevscovid19.org/
